price: Walikuwa hawakatazani maovu waliyo kuwa wakiyafanya. Hakika ni maovu yalioje mambo waliyo kuwa wakiyafanya!
arabic: كَانُواْ لَا يَتَنَاهَوۡنَ عَن مُّنكَرٖ فَعَلُوهُۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
footnotes: Mtindo wao ulikuwa kutoambizana. Hapana amkatazaye mwenzie kufanya uovu. Kufanya kwao uovu na kuacha kukatazana ni katika vitendo vinavyo chusha mno!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kānū lā yatanāhawna ʿan munkarin faʿalūhu labi'sa mā kānū yafʿalūna
